00044 void testWithSentence(Analyzer& analyzer, const string& str, ofstream& output)
00045 {
00046     // ignore the empty line
00047     if(str.empty())
00048     {
00049         return;
00050     }
00051 
00052     Sentence s(str.c_str());
00053 
00054     int result = analyzer.runWithSentence(s);
00055     if(result != 1)
00056     {
00057         cerr << "fail in Analyzer::runWithSentence()" << endl;
00058         exit(1);
00059     }
00060 
00061     // get n-best results
00062     int count = s.getListSize();
00063     if(count > 0)
00064     {
00065         output << s.getListSize() << endl;
00066         for(int i=0; i<s.getListSize(); ++i)
00067         {
00068             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00069             {
00070                 if(j == 0)
00071                 {
00072                     output << s.getScore(i) << analyzer.getWordDelimiter();
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 const char* pLexicon = s.getLexicon(i, j);
00076                 // print word with POS alphabet string
00077                 output << pLexicon << analyzer.getPOSDelimiter() << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << analyzer.getWordDelimiter();
00078             }
00079             output << endl;
00080         }
00081     }
00082     else
00083     {
00084         cerr << "no n-best result exists for input string: " << str << endl;
00085     }
00086 }

00091 void testWithStream(Analyzer& analyzer, const char* source, const char* dest)
00092 {
00093     assert(source);
00094     assert(dest);
00095 
00096     ifstream in(source);
00097     if(! in)
00098     {
00099         cerr << "[Error] The input file " << source << " not exists!" << endl;
00100         exit(1);
00101     }
00102 
00103     ofstream out(dest);
00104     if(! out)
00105     {
00106         cerr << "[Error] The output file " << dest << " could not be created!" << endl;
00107         exit(1);
00108     }
00109 
00110     string line;
00111     while(getline(in, line))
00112     {
00113         testWithSentence(analyzer, line, out);
00114     }
00115 }

00120 void printUsage()
00121 {
00122     cerr << "Usages: ./jma_pos_nbest --dict DICT_PATH --nbest N INPUT OUTPUT" << endl;
00123 }

00128 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00129 {
00130     if(argc < 7)
00131     {
00132         printUsage();
00133         exit(1);
00134     }
00135 
00136     // check argument
00137     if(strcmp(argv[1], "--dict") || strcmp(argv[3], "--nbest"))
00138     {
00139         printUsage();
00140         exit(1);
00141     }
00142 
00143     const char* sysdict = argv[2];
00144     int nbest = atoi(argv[4]);
00145     if(nbest < 1)
00146     {
00147         cerr << "invalid number for n-best value" << endl;
00148         printUsage();
00149         exit(1);
00150     }
00151 
00152     // time evaluation for command option "--stream INPUT OUTPUT"
00153     clock_t stime = clock();
00154 
00155     // create instances
00156     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00157     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00158     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00159 
00160     // set the number of N-best results,
00161     // if this function is not called, one-best analysis is performed defaultly on Analyzer::runWithSentence().
00162     analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, nbest);
00163 
00164     // output POS in alphabet format
00165     analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, 1);
00166 
00167     // load dictioanry files
00168     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00169     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00170     {
00171         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00172         exit(1);
00173     }
00174     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00175 
00176     // set knowledge
00177     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00178     {
00179         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00180         exit(1);
00181     }
00182 
00183     // no POS output
00184     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00185 
00186     clock_t etime = clock();
00187     double dif = (double)(etime - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00188     cout << "knowledge loading time: " << dif << endl;
00189 
00190     testWithStream(*analyzer, argv[5], argv[6]);
00191 
00192     dif = (double)(clock() - etime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00193     cout << "stream analysis time: " << dif << endl;
00194 
00195     dif = (double)(clock() - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00196     cout << "total time: " << dif << endl;
00197 
00198     // destroy instances
00199     delete knowledge;
00200     delete analyzer;
00201 
00202     return 0;
00203 }
